attributes.action: increase tax free income to £30k p.a.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To enable the economy to return to normal, lets put more cash in the publics pocket, rather than the banks!
Just think, families will be able to eat, drink, holiday and pay their mortgage. Good news too for the taxman, as he will get his fair share at the check-out, reduced benefit payments as demand will increase employment. Happy times, happy faces!.
